name: SupportNeimiAndDoggo
_source: speak;Neimi;Oh!|There you are, {v:DoggoName}.|I've been looking around the camp for you.
speak;Neimi;I-I was hoping to find you...|I lost one of my arrows during practice.
speak;Neimi;It flew into those bushes over there, but I'm too afraid to go look.|There might be...s-spiders.
speak;Neimi;D-do you think you could help me find it?|If it's not too much trouble...
speak;Neimi;I hope it's not too difficult to find...|My grandfather made those arrows for me.
speak;Neimi;You found it!|Oh, thank you so much, {v:DoggoName}!|That was so kind of you.
speak;Neimi;You know, you may look fearsome, but you have a gentle heart.|I'm glad we're fighting together.
speak;Neimi;I think we can be good friends.
speak;Neimi;{v:DoggoName}!|There you are!|I've been looking for you.
speak;Neimi;I made you something...|It's a little thank you for helping me find my arrow the other day.
speak;Neimi;I carved some patterns on this stick...|I-it's not much, but I thought maybe...|You might like something to fetch?
speak;Neimi;My grandfather taught me how to carve.|He said a good archer should know how to make their own arrows, but...|I thought maybe I could make something fun instead.
speak;Neimi;Would you like to try it out?|Just be careful, I don't want you to hurt your teeth or anything...
speak;Neimi;Good job!|You know, I used to be so afraid of Hellhounds...|Everyone in my village told such scary stories about them.
speak;Neimi;But you're nothing like those stories.|You're loyal and kind and...|
speak;Neimi;*Sniff*|I'm just glad to have a friend like you.
speak;Neimi;|S-sorry. I cry too easily.|Colm always teases me about it.
speak;Neimi;Thank you for not making fun of me.|Would you like to play some more?
speak;Neimi;You want me to follow you?|Okay, I trust you...
speak;Neimi;Oh!|The poor thing!|It's a wounded fawn!
speak;Neimi;You found it and came to get me?|It's just a small wound, I think I can help.
speak;Neimi;I always carry some herbs and bandages.|My grandfather taught me how to treat minor wounds in the wild.
speak;Neimi;You know, {v:DoggoName}, you really are special.|A normal Hellhound would have...|Well, they wouldn't have tried to save this fawn.
speak;Neimi;There we go.|That should be enough bandages.|It should heal nicely now.
speak;Neimi;We should leave it here.|Its mother will come back when it's safe.
speak;Neimi;You're such a gentle soul, {v:DoggoName}.|You've taught me something important.
speak;Neimi;You've shown me that we shouldn't judge by appearances or rumors.|That even in the darkest times, kindness can be found in the most unexpected places.
speak;Neimi;When this war is over...|Would you like to come back to my village with me?|I think the children would love to meet you.
speak;Neimi;It's a promise then!|We'll show everyone that a Hellhound can be the most loyal friend of all.
